TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 338
TEI.2.document_title: J M J Carbajal to Stephen F Austin, 03-08-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Maria J. Carbajal to Austin, Bethany, Va., March 8. 1830. Many families thinking of moving to Texas and wish to see Austin's map. Carbajal asks Austin's aid in selling copies of the Bible in Spanish. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 338

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José Maria J. Carbajal to Austin, Bethany, Va., March 8. 1830. Many families thinking of moving to Texas and wish to see Austin's map. Carbajal asks Austin's aid in selling copies of the Bible in Spanish. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bethany, Va.*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="03-08-1830">March 8, 1830.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
